resources.string: "Spread peanut butter on one slice of bread and jelly on another. Put them together to form a sandwich."
"Pour your favorite cereal into a bowl and add milk."
"Blend a banana with a cup of milk or yogurt until smooth."
"Mash avocado onto toasted bread slices. Sprinkle with salt, pepper, and red pepper flakes."
"Place eggs in a pot, cover with water, and bring to a boil. Boil for 8–10 minutes, then cool and peel."
"Butter two slices of bread, place cheese between them, and grill until golden and crispy."
"Cook spaghetti until al dente. In a pan, heat olive oil and minced garlic. Toss cooked pasta with oil, garlic, red pepper flakes, and parsley."
"Chop a variety of fruits (e.g., strawberries, kiwi, mango, and pineapple) and mix in a bowl. Optionally, squeeze some lemon juice over the top."
"Mash avocados and mix with diced onions, tomatoes, cilantro, lime juice, salt, and pepper."
"Whisk eggs with a splash of milk, cook in a pan over medium heat, stirring until softly scrambled."
"Heat oil in a pan, add chopped vegetables (e.g., bell peppers, broccoli, carrots), season with soy sauce, and stir-fry until tender."
"Mix flour, sugar, baking powder, salt, milk, eggs, and melted butter until smooth. Cook spoonfuls of batter on a hot griddle until bubbles form, then flip and cook until golden brown."
"Grill chicken breasts, slice, and serve over romaine lettuce with Caesar dressing, croutons, and Parmesan cheese."
"Sauté onions, carrots, celery, and garlic in a pot. Add broth, diced tomatoes, and your choice of vegetables. Simmer until vegetables are tender."
"Cook ground beef with taco seasoning. Fill taco shells with meat, shredded lettuce, diced tomatoes, cheese, and salsa."
"Cook ground beef with onions and garlic. Add tomato sauce and simmer. Serve over cooked spaghetti with grated Parmesan."
"Rub chicken drumsticks with olive oil and seasonings. Bake in the oven until golden and cooked through."
"Sauté onion and garlic in butter. Add rice and cook until lightly toasted. Stir in chicken broth and simmer until rice is cooked."
"Season salmon fillets with salt, pepper, and lemon juice. Grill until fish is cooked through and flakes easily with a fork."
"Layer cooked lasagna noodles with meat sauce, ricotta cheese mixture, and shredded mozzarella. Bake until bubbly and golden."
"Marinate beef strips in soy sauce, ginger, and garlic. Stir-fry with vegetables and cooked noodles."
"Rub a whole chicken with olive oil, salt, pepper, and herbs. Roast in the oven until golden and cooked through."
"Sauté mushrooms and onions in butter. Add Arborio rice and gradually stir in chicken broth until creamy."
"Cook pasta, grill chicken, and toss with Alfredo sauce, grated Parmesan, and chopped parsley."
"Make pizza dough, roll it out, top with sauce, cheese, and toppings, and bake until crust is crispy and cheese is bubbly."
"Brown beef cubes in a pot. Add onions, carrots, potatoes, and beef broth. Simmer until meat and vegetables are tender."
"Spread sushi rice on nori sheets, add fillings (e.g., cucumber, avocado, cooked shrimp), and roll tightly. Slice and serve with soy sauce and wasabi."
"Wrap beef tenderloin in puff pastry with a layer of mushroom duxelles. Bake until pastry is golden brown and meat is cooked to your liking."
"Mix flour, sugar, cocoa powder, baking powder, baking soda, eggs, milk, oil, and vanilla. Bake in a cake pan until a toothpick inserted comes out clean. Frost as desired."
"Make laminated dough by folding butter into layers of dough. Roll out, cut into triangles, roll up into crescents, and bake until golden brown and flaky."
